/event/tags: GET - GET all the event on the basis of tags
event/newevent/:userId: POST - Create new event - require Authentication and Authorization
event/editevent/:eventId: PUT - Edit the event - require Authentication and Authorization
event/deleteevent/:eventId: DELETE - Delete the event - require Authentication and Authorization
event/allevent/:userId: GET - GET all the event on the basis of User Id
/user/edituser/:userId: PUT - Edit the User - require Authentication and Authorization
/user/deluser/:userId: DELETE - Delete the User - require Authentication and Authorization
